title.rendered: Hinged Roller Set Compatible with PS4 DVD Drive slim 1100 1200

content.rendered:
Experience precise control and smooth movements with this opticals drive bearing component for the popular game consoles.
Crafted from ABS material, this component ensures durability and long time usage.
Stable characteristics and highs reliability, for long time service.
Easy installation.
Perfect for gamers who want to replace their worn Outs or broken opticals drive bearing component on their consoles.
